name: Philly Cheesesteak
label: American
instructions: In a large skillet over medium heat, heat 1 tablespoon oil. Add bell peppers and onion; season with salt. Cook, stirring often, until caramelized, about 12 to 15 minutes. Transfer bell peppers and onion to a plate.
In the same skillet over medium-high heat, heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil. Cook steak, turning occasionally, until desired degree of doneness, about 5 minutes; season with salt and pepper.
Return veggies to skillet and toss to combine with steak. Top with provolone. Cover and cook until cheese is melted, about 3 minutes more.
Using a serrated knife, cut into the long side of each roll, being sure not to cut all the way through. Divide cheesesteak mixture among rolls and serve.
